Title: #139 Thinking PBL with the Buck Institute
Description:
Rody Boonchouy @rodyboo from the Buck Institute talks about effective project based learning. With a powerful metaphor explaining the difference between projects and project based learning, Rody sets the stage to discuss PBL trends and tips. Let's dive deeper into PBL.

www.coolcatteacher.com/e139
